checker_desc: Prefer using AnyObject over class for class-only protocols.
Prefer using Array(seq) over seq.map { $0 } to convert a sequence into an Array.
Prefer the new block based KVO API with keypaths when using Swift 3.2 or later.
Closing brace with closing parenthesis should not have any whitespaces in the middle.
Attributes should be on their own lines in functions and types, but on the same line as variables and imports.
Colons should be next to the identifier when specifying a type and next to the key in dictionary literals.
Types used for hosting only static members should be implemented as a caseless enum to avoid instantiation.
Prefer checking isEmpty over comparing collection to an empty array or dictionary literal.
Closure bodies should not span too many lines.
Prefer contains over first(where:) != nil and firstIndex(where:) != nil.
Enum can’t contain multiple cases with the same name.
Delegate protocols should be class-only so they can be weakly referenced.
When using trailing closures, empty parentheses should be avoided after the method call.
Closure end should have the same indentation as the line that started it.
When registering for a notification using a block, the opaque observer that is returned should be stored so it can be removed later.
Prefer empty collection over optional collection.
Number of function parameters should be low.
TODOs and FIXMEs should be resolved prior to their expiry date.
if, for, guard, switch, while, and catch statements shouldn’t unnecessarily wrap their conditionals or arguments in parentheses.
Availability checks or attributes shouldn’t be using older versions that are satisfied by the deployment target.
Number of associated values in an enum case should be low
where clauses are preferred over a single if inside a for.
All elements in a collection literal should be vertically aligned
Generic type name should only contain alphanumeric characters, start with an uppercase character and span between 1 and 20 characters in length.
Prefer contains over range(of:) != nil and range(of:) == nil.
Prefer flatMap over map followed by reduce([], +).
Closure parameters should be on the same line as opening brace.
Closure expressions should have a single space inside each brace.
There should be no space before and one after any comma.
Conditional statements should always return on the next line
Complexity of function bodies should be limited.
Top-level declarations should specify Access Control Level keywords explicitly.
Properties should have a type interface
File name should not contain any whitespace.
Discouraged direct initialization of types that can be harmful.
Prefer checking isEmpty over comparing string to an empty string literal.

Header comments should be consistent with project patterns. The SWIFTLINT_CURRENT_FILENAME placeholder can optionally be used in the required and forbidden patterns. It will be replaced by the real file name.
Files should not span too many lines.
File name should match a type or extension declared in the file (if any).
Functions bodies should not span too many lines.
The initializers declared in compiler protocols such as ExpressibleByArrayLiteral shouldn’t be called directly.
second argument to ‘va_start’ is not the last named parameter
block captures an autoreleasing out-parameter, which may result in use-after-free bugs
command should not be used in a comment attached to a non-container declaration
function is not needed and will not be emitted
HTML end tag ‘A’ is forbidden; HTML end tag does not match any start tag; HTML tag ‘A’ requires an end tag
variable A is used/captured uninitialized whenever some condition
comparison of nonnull function call/parameter ‘B’ not equal to a null pointer is true/false on first encounter
writable atomic property A cannot pair a synthesized getter/setter with a user defined getter/setter
data argument not used by format string
property type A is incompatible with type B inherited from C
illegal character encoding in character literal/string literal
the current #pragma pack alignment value is modified in the included file; unterminated ‘#pragma pack (push, …)’ at end of file
A used as the name of the previous parameter rather than as part of the selector
loop will run at most once (loop increment never executed)
parameter of overriding method should be annotated with __attribute__((noescape))
(class) property A requires method B to be defined
c99-extensions产生的告警如 ’A’ is a C99 extension; compound literals are a C99-specific feature等
property access result unused - getters should not be used for side effects
array parameter is missing a nullability type specifier (_Nonnull, _Nullable, or _Null_unspecified)
missing submodule ‘A’; umbrella directory ‘A’ not found; umbrella header for module ‘A’ does not include header ‘B’
use of NULL in arithmetic operation; comparison between NULL and non-pointer
using the result of an assignment as a condition without parentheses; A has lower precedence than B
default property attribute ‘assign’ not appropriate for object
performSelector may cause a leak because its selector is unknown
overflow converting case value to switch condition type (A to B); case value not in enumerated type A
result of comparison of constant A/true/false with boolean expression is always B
add explicit braces to avoid dangling else
for loop/while loop/statement/range-based has empty body
implicit boolean conversion of Objective-C object literal always evaluates to true; type not compatible
unknown platform A in availability macro; availability does not match previous declaration
implicit conversion loses integer precision: A to B
ISO C++11 does not allow conversion from string literal to A
redefinition of typedef A is a C11 feature
property attribute in class extension does not match the primary class
treating Unicode character <U+A> as identifier character rather than as ‘B’ symbol
expression which evaluates to zero treated as a null pointer constant of type A

weak variable/property/implicit property/instance variable B is accessed multiple times in this function/method/block/lambda but may be unpredictably set to nil; assign to a strong variable to keep the object alive
// comments are not allowed in this language or multi-line // comment or ’/*’ within block comment
pointer/block pointer/member pointer is missing a nullability type specifier (_Nonnull, _Nullable, or _Null_unspecified)
this function/block declaration is not a prototype
cast integer type to pointer type
variable A may be uninitialized when used here/captured by block
包含认证凭证(各类账密、密钥、私钥证书等)，危害：凭证泄漏可能导致服务器被黑客利用； 修复建议：在【最新代码】和【历史提交】两处中将相应敏感信息删除
包含不和谐言论(政治、色情、辱骂等)，修复建议：删除代码中包含的不和谐言论
检测员工信息被大量泄露的场景。危害：批量泄漏公司内部人员个人信息，造成严重信息泄漏，修复建议：删除敏感信息

Setting a read-only field of a global variable. By default, most standard globals and fields are marked as read-only, so that setting them produces a warning.  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)

Setting a read-only global variable. By default, most standard globals and fields are marked as read-only, so that setting them produces a warning.  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)
Value of a loop variable is unused. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Accessing an undefined field of a global variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)
Value of an argument is unused. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Accessing uninitialized local variable.  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Setting an undefined field of a global variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)

Accessing an undefined global variable.Try to use local to define variables so that they are not misused as global variables and pollute the namespace[规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)
Loop variable is set but never accessed. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Mutating uninitialized local variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)

Mutating an undefined global variable。Try to use local to define variables so that they are not misused as global variables and pollute the namespace[规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)
Trailing whitespace in a string. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)
Local variable is set but never accessed. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)

An empty statement. In Lua 5.2+ semicolons are considered statements and can appear even when not following normal statements. Such semicolons produce Luacheck warnings as they are completely useless. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
A numeric for loop goes from #(expr) down to 1 or less without negative step, [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
err_example:
for i = #t, 1 do
	   print(t[i])
 end  
 correct for example: 
 for i = #t, 1, -1 do
   	print(t[i])
 end

checker_desc: Setting an undefined global variable。[规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)
err_example:
a = {b=1,[1] = 2, {}, 4, 5, "abc", function() end} 
 foo {123, b = 456, {789}, function() a = {1} end}

checker_desc: Local variable is accessed but never set. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Loop can be executed at most once.  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
Shadowing a loop variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)

A line contains trailing whitespace. Remove unnecessary Spaces at the end of the line.  Any tabs or spaces after either ) would be considered trailing.
Any tabs or spaces after the . in the comment would be considered trailing
Any tabs or spaces on the empty line between the two print statements would also be considered a form of trailing whitespace.[规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)
Shadowing an upvalue argument. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
Unused implicitly defined global variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#global-variables-1xx)
The loop variable is not in use. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
An argument is set but never accessed. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Trailing whitespace in a comment. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)
Value assigned to a local variable is mutated but never accessed. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Left-hand side of an assignment is too short. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
Value assigned to a local variable is unused. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)

err_example:
local function f(x)
   	 local x = x or "default" -- bad
 end

checker_desc: Inconsistent indentation (SPACE followed by TAB). [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)
Line is too long. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)
Shadowing a local variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
Unused label, Labels that are not used by any goto statements are reported as unused. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
Shadowing an upvalue loop variable.[规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
Local variables change, but are never accessed. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Left-hand side of an assignment is too long. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
Value of a field in a table literal is unused.  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#unused-variables-2xx-and-values-3xx)
Redefining a local variable.   [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
err_example:
local function f(x) 
 end 
 local function f(x)
 end

checker_desc: An empty do end block. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
Redefining a loop variable. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#shadowing-declarations-4xx)
An empty if branch. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
Unreachable code. foe example:  [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
err_example:
for i = 1, 100 do
   	-- Break statement is outside the `if` block,
	   -- so that the loop always stops after the first iteration.
	   if cond(i) then f() end break
 end

checker_desc: Cyclomatic complexity of a function is too high. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#control-flow-and-data-flow-issues-5xx)
A line consists of nothing but whitespace. [规则详情](https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html#formatting-issues-6xx)
